basic_information.scholarship_name: KJ Tullis Memorial Scholarship Fore! PGA Management

description: The purpose of this scholarship is to provide support for PGM majors. Eligibility Requirements Complete qualifying application Must be a PGM major Full Time Student minimum 2.75 GPA This scholarship is available to apply for during the current student application period.
